title: my ping is high only in LOL
body: hey guys yesterday i was playing lol and at the middle of the game suddenly my ping went to 250 from 100 and now i still have the problem.i tried every thing re-patch,firewall,proxy WiFi reset , DNS etc.i check my ping at APEX LEGENDS AND PUBG and i have 100 ms in them.my ping is high in lol only pls help me.
